item.description:

  • has been receiving his salary in the dollar-pegged stablecoin Dai since 2018
  • monthly U.S. dollar spending limits were recently reduced to just $200 per person
  • global dollar hegemony
  • exit strategy against the fiat money printing presses
  • Millions in Crypto Is Crossing the Russia-China Border Daily. There, Tether Is King.
  • Omni Core v0.3.0
  • Tether nearly lost $30 million from a hack

To read about the purpose of this article series, see… ... https://medium.com/human-rights-foundation-hrf/privacy-and-cryptocurrency-part-v-bisq-runescape-and-stories-from-buying-bitcoin-anonymously-f345a0eecf59 ...

Narro is the simple way to listen to the web - a text to speech podcast app. Narro will take your bookmarked articles and read them back to you as a podcast. ... http://www.narro.co/faq ...
